metadata.dc:author: Pereira García, A B
Inufia Suárez, R
Dueñas Fernández, R
Rodríguez, S
Prado, M I
de los Santos, N
metadata.dc:description: The population comprising all subjects over 15 years of age from a health area served by a medical office was analyzed by a survey with the aim of determining which patients were at risk of developing an ischemic cardiopathy and including them in the Coronary Disease Program implemented at the Cardio Center of Villa Clara. Nursing interventions in performing the different tests are reported.
metadata.dc:title: Factores de riesgo coronario relacionado con alteraciones ergometricas y electrocardiograficas, Septiembre de 1992 a Mayo de 1993.
[Coronary risk factors related to ergometric and radiographic changes, September 1992 to May 1993].
